name: Manta Ray
bestiarytext: The Manta Ray is a symbol of change for the more intelligent creatures of the deep. They often roam the seas in groups of two or more. Usually they are peaceful inhabitants of the depths but beware of their poison - they certainly know how to defend themselves.
location: [[Fiehonja]] only in stage 3 in {{Mapper Coords|130.232|121.251|12|4|text=a large room}}.
strategy: Suggested to chase down and use a [[Foxtail]] if you want to tame it.
